get.description: Get block details by providing either `blockHash`, `blockHeight`, or `absoluteSlot`. If none of these are provided, ensure both `epoch` and `slot` parameters are included.

parameters.name: poolId
parameters.description: Hex representation of the pool id

parameters.name: poolId
parameters.description: Hex representation of the pool id

parameters.name: retiredPools
parameters.description: Flag to include retired pools in the response

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field to sort the response by

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of pools to fetch per page

parameters.description: If fingerprint of the asset is not supplied, assetId is required
